title: #100DaysOfCode day 11
body:
## Progress

* [Published the category archive page](https://github.com/johanbaaij/personal-website/commit/bc4538f11559455e5fa8e0b07a56a3f3219d18be)

## Links

* While I have only used Glimpse for small tasks so far, my first impressions are positive. The interface certainly struck me as more intuitive than GIMP, which it has been forked from.[ (https://glimpse-editor.org/](https://glimpse-editor.org/))
description: Fun fact: The windowing system for Unix computers is known as X11
